mapper.insert: insert into plan(name, begin_date, end_date, plan_status, "describe", create_time, create_by, project_id) VALUES ( #{name}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, '${planStatus}', #{describe}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{projectId})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.begin_date, a.end_date, a.plan_status, a.create_time, b.name create_by_name, a.describe, array_length(bugs, 1) bug_cnt, array_length(requirements, 1) requirement_cnt, c.name project_name, a.project_id from "plan" a join "user" b on b.id = a.create_by join project c on c.id = a.project_id where a.id=#{id}
select a.id, a.name from "requirement" a where a.id in (select unnest(x.requirements) from plan x where x.id = #{id})
select a.id, a.name from "bug" a where a.id in (select unnest(x.bugs) from plan x where x.id = #{id})
